explains: adj. 排斥的；令人厌恶的；击退的；冷淡的

sentences.en: A statue which is aesthetically pleasing to one person, however, may be repulsive to another.
sentences.cn: 从审美角度令一个人满意的一尊雕像可能令另一个人反感。

sentences.en: This is based on the theory that close-range, nonbonded interactions are repulsive, i.e. Steric strain.
sentences.cn: 这基于这样的理论，即近距离，非键相互作用是排斥的，即立体应变。

sentences.en: So that is a repulsive term.
